Scene:
The Attack in the Palace
(Denchū ninjō / 殿中刃傷)

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Production: December 1976

– Click image to view.

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:
